top_projects.name: spotmech
top_projects.description: ‘SPOTMECH’ aims to address the problems faced by drivers during unexpected vehicle breakdowns and emergencies on the road by providing a comprehensive solution that includes a database of resources, a library of educational materials, a dedicated helpline, and GPS tracking.

top_projects.name: Noteflix
top_projects.description: Noteflix is College Management System (CMS) is a web-based application developed using Python django. It is designed to manage the activities of a college, such as student enrollment, grading, and financial management. The Noteflix project is an open-source project, meaning it is free to use and modify.

profile_summary:
Minhaj is a highly skilled and innovative Python Django developer with a strong background in designing and implementing scalable microservices architecture. With a solid foundation in Python, JavaScript, and Jupyter Notebook, Minhaj brings a unique combination of technical expertise and collaborative approach to deliver high-performance solutions. As a continuous learner, Minhaj stays up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, enabling him to drive innovation and excellence in his work. With a growing professional network of 6 followers and an impressive portfolio of 70 public repositories, Minhaj has established himself as a reliable and accomplished developer in the industry.

Minhaj's expertise in performance optimization and cross-functional collaboration enables him to work effectively with teams to drive project success. His proficiency in Python, JavaScript, and other technologies makes him a versatile and valuable asset to any organization. As a skilled developer with a passion for innovation and excellence, Minhaj is committed to delivering high-quality solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry. With his strong technical skills, collaborative approach, and dedication to continuous learning, Minhaj is well-positioned to drive success in his field and make a lasting impact as a leading Python Django developer.
